item.title: Robinhood Launches Pro and College Football Prediction Markets
item.dc:creator: MichaÅ‚ Rutkowski
item.description:
ðŸš€ Robinhood has launched pro and college football prediction markets in its app! Since the introduction of prediction markets last year, over 2 billion contracts have been traded. Now, users can trade outcomes for popular football games, including all regular season pro matchups and college Power 4 schools. These markets will be available for eligible customers soon, with contracts for the first two weeks of the season. Unlike traditional sports betting, these contracts allow customers toâ€¦

Source: Robinhood Engineering
Author: olivermcintosh
Category: product_announcements

item.title: Introducing Digests by Robinhood Cortex for customers in the UK
item.dc:creator: MichaÅ‚ Rutkowski
item.description:
ðŸš€ Exciting news for UK investors! Robinhood has launched Digests powered by Robinhood Cortex, an AI-driven feature that explains stock movements in clear language. This tool reviews news, analyst reports, and proprietary data to help users make informed decisions. Available for free on stock detail pages, Digests aims to support investors of all experience levels. For more details, visit the Help Centre. #InvestSmart #StockMarket #AI #Robinhood #UKInvestors

Source: Robinhood Engineering
Author: olivermcintosh
Category: product_announcements
